Token.Abstract: This class provides several fields and methods useful as wire format parameter names. The methods are used for wire format parameter names that are indexed.
Generates the correct parameter name for a content group with an index.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: the index of the content group.

ReturnValue.Abstract: an NSString representing the content group parameter for the index.

Token.Abstract: Generates the correct parameter name for a custon dimension with an index.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: the index of the custom dimension.

ReturnValue.Abstract: an NSString representing the custom dimension parameter for the index.

Token.Abstract: Generates the correct parameter name for a custom metric with an index.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: the index of the custom metric.

ReturnValue.Abstract: an NSString representing the custom metric parameter for the index.
